duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee all financial activities of the organization, including financial statements, projections, budgeting, FP&A, cash management, investments, auditing, insurance, and treasury.
Champion and implement best practices within accounting and financial management for the organization.
Drive the go-forward plan of the business from a financial standpoint, supporting operational and strategic growth.
Partner with the CEO and leadership team to drive growth and business success strategically and effectively.

education_certification.credential: Master’s degree in Accounting or Finance (CPA designation highly preferred)
